fields.Name: Unitus Credit Union
fields.Eligibility Notes:
Unitus is committed to serving our community and the people who live or work here. Youâ€™re eligible to join the credit union if you or a family member* live or work in the State of Washington**, or one of the following Oregon counties:

fields.Name: VSECU
fields.Eligibility Notes:
You can become a member if you:

live or work in Vermont
are related to a VSECU member
are a member of the Northeast Sustainable Energy Association
meet other qualifications outlined in their Bylaws

fields.Name: Opportunities Credit Union
fields.Eligibility Notes: A resident of the State of Vermont, or relative of a current member of Opportunities Credit Union
